titles.title: My Faith Looks Up To Thee

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: My faith looks up to Thee, newline Thou Lamb of Calvary, newline Savior divine! newline Now hear me while I pray; newline Take all my guilt away. newline Oh let me from this day newline Be wholly Thine!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: May Thy rich grace impart newline Strength to my fainting heart, newline My zeal inspire. newline As Thou hast died for me, newline Oh may my love to Thee newline Pure, warm and changeless be, newline A living fire.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: While life's dark maze I tread, newline And griefs around me spread newline Be Thou my Guide. newline Bid darkness turn to day; newline Wipe sorrow's tears away; newline Nor let me ever stray newline From Thee aside!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: When ends life's transient dream, newline When death's cold sullen stream newline Shall o'er me roll, newline Blest Savior, then in love, newline Fear and distrust remove. newline Oh bear me safe above, newline A ransomed soul.
